desc: Our hand rolled cigars are crafted with quality blends of premium natural tobaccos from the finest growing areas of the world, while our spirit infusions add a distinctive compliment to our blend of factory hand rolled Dominican based tobaccos, for a delightful experience.

layout.text: All of our tobaccos are expertly selected and carefully aged to bring the highest quality and finest flavors to our unique brand of boutique hand-rolled and spirit infused cigars.
